login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access Imagor Studio

validation.emailRequired: Please enter a valid email address
validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least {{min}} characters
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

admin.title: Admin
admin.setupDescription: Let's get your image gallery set up in just a few steps
admin.guestModeDescription: Allow users to browse the gallery without creating an account
admin.homeTitleDescription: Customize the title displayed for the home/root folder in the gallery
admin.systemSettingsDescription: These settings can be changed later in the admin panel.
admin.storageDescription: Configure where your images will be stored
admin.storageConfiguredRestart: Storage configured successfully! Please restart the server to apply changes.

storage.bucketDescription: The name of your S3 bucket where images will be stored
storage.regionDescription: AWS region where your bucket is located (e.g., us-east-1, eu-west-1)
storage.customEndpointDescription: Custom S3 endpoint for S3-compatible services (leave empty for AWS S3)
storage.forcePathStyleDescription: Enable for MinIO and LocalStack. Most other S3-compatible services work better with this disabled.
storage.accessKeyIdDescription: AWS access key ID (leave empty to use IAM roles or environment variables)
storage.secretAccessKeyDescription: AWS secret access key (leave empty to use IAM roles or environment variables)
storage.sessionTokenDescription: AWS session token (only required for temporary credentials)
storage.baseDirectoryDescription: Optional prefix for all object keys in the bucket (e.g., "images/")
storage.testConfigurationFirst: Please fill in the {{storageType}} storage configuration first
storage.configurationOverridden: Storage configuration is managed by external configuration

imagor.imagorConfigurationDescription: Configure image processing settings. Imagor handles image transformations and optimizations.
imagor.selectModeDescription: Choose how Imagor will process your images
imagor.embeddedModeDescription: Run Imagor as part of this application (recommended for most users)
imagor.externalModeDescription: Connect to an external Imagor service (advanced configuration)
imagor.secretDescription: Optional secret key for signing image URLs. Leave empty to use the JWT secret.
imagor.externalSecretDescription: Secret key used by the external Imagor service for URL signing.
imagor.embeddedModeSimplified: Embedded mode uses fixed configuration with secure defaults. No additional configuration required.
imagor.baseUrlInvalid: Please enter a valid URL starting with http:// or https://
imagor.baseUrlDescription: The base URL of your external Imagor service
imagor.unsafeModeDescription: Allow processing images without URL signing (not recommended for production)
imagor.signerTypeDescription: Hash algorithm used for URL signing
imagor.signerTruncateDescription: Number of characters to truncate from the signature (0 = no truncation)
imagor.configurationOverridden: Imagor configuration is managed by external configuration
imagor.configuredSuccessRestart: Imagor configured successfully! Please restart the server to apply changes.
imagor.serverRestartDescription: Imagor configuration changes will take effect after restarting the server.
imagor.externalRequirement1: External imagor loader/storage must align with Imagor Studio storage settings
imagor.externalRequirement2: CORS must be enabled for metadata/EXIF access

footerText: Built on top of {{uiLink}}. The source code is available on {{githubLink}}.

modeDescriptions.fill: Scale to fill dimensions with crop

output.formatDescription: Choose output format or keep original
output.qualityAutoOptimized: Quality will be automatically optimized to meet size limit
output.targetSize: Target: {{size}} - Quality will be automatically reduced to meet this limit
output.autoReduceQuality: Automatically reduces quality to meet file size limit

howItWorksItems.format: Format: Choose output format or keep original
howItWorksItems.maxSize: Max Size: Automatically adjusts quality to fit under the target file size

crop.cropDescription: Crop pixels from each edge of the image
crop.autoTrimDescription: Automatically remove whitespace and transparent edges
